channel.title: TF2 VS CSS
channel.description:
PLEASE HELP ME DECIDE HERE AT BMS!!!!
I REALLY NEED HELP DECIDING ON WHICH ONE TO GET
I CANT DECIDE WITHOUT OPINIONS!!

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: Cris90
item.description:
Dust:

Your not doing it right then.

If your not working as a team, the chances of you winning decrease.

The same goes for CSS.

D4RKN3SS, you should buy both. TF2 can provide more fun, but CSS is a little more challenging and provide more adrenaline. At least for me.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
qwert33:

TF2:
+Encourages TEAMplay.

Why does everyone say this? The closest thing to teamplay in TF2 is the medic/assault class combo. Everything else is just individuals working for a common goal, much in the same way sharks and dolphins will attack large schools of fish together.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: qwert33
item.description:
TF2:
+more friendly to newcomers (humour/ramdom crits/balanced class system)
+it can be played houmourus and serious while getting appropriate effects.
+Does not rely on 1 skill (point & shoot).
+Encourages TEAMplay.
+A LOT more variety in gameplay.
-when your whole team doesn’t want to play medic
-fence hoppers (people that want to swich to teh winning team)
(±) A lot of updates

CSS:
+GREAT LAN-party game.
+adrenalie fed
-"1337 Pr0"s will frstrate you
-Very rude language will frustrate you
-but you’ll keep playing. (quote: “i hate this game” keeps on playing)

My reckomendation:
Buy TF2 (in the Orange Box!) from steam,
Get a copy of CSS when you go to a LAN party. (some ways are more legal than others)

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
The price of CSS ought to be dropped to 5 dollars. It’s a good deal for the six hours of entertainment you get before you download too many skins and eventually get tired of it.

Then it’s only useful if you play Garry’s Mod, as several hundred addons require that you have it installed.

Most of these addons suck and you wouldn’t want them anyway.

So CSS is pretty useless.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
TF2 all the way. It has just the right amount of goofiness, the art style is amazing, and the gameplay is easy to get the hand of but at the same time very intuitive. CSS is so full of noobs and/or pr0s that you can never really enjoy it.

Plus CSS == CS :fffuuu:

While we’re on the subject, how’s FF?

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: JamestheDoc
item.description:
TF2 obviously wins out, but if you ever have the extra money or get to try it out, get CS: S.

In its defense there ARE servers out there populated with rational, mature gamers you can actually enjoy playing with. It’s just a matter of finding them. I still play it regularly in between TF2 and L4D1 and 2. It’s a good casual game when you get on the right servers.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 VS CSS
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
TF2 is an insanely well thought through game that Valve continually strives to perfect in every way it can. Its looks have no impact what so ever on my enjoyment of it. In fact, if it was full of gritty realism it wouldn’t be half as fun.

I think the only time gritty realism would improve the game would be if you were a immature knob who thinks that playing a game that could in any way make them look childish must be shit for that reason alone.

Read full topic
